resources.string:
Hi, my name is Khooshrin.
I like watching TV shows.
Friends and B99 are my favourite.
I like listening to Shawn Mendes.
Iron Man is my favourite superhero.Then I like Spiderman.Then Captain America. Loki is my favourite villain. I am 18 years old. I like to eat food. Macaroni, Spaghetti, pasta, pizza, burger, fries,ice cream, desserts and many more food items are adored by me.
Trisha, Teju, Kolady, Shriya, Kriti, Meghan and Natasha are my bestest friends.
I study Computer Science and Information Systems Engineering at Birla Institue of Technology and Science Hyderabad Campus. I am waiting for the campus to reopen.
I am a non-vegetarian. I enjoy chinese food. I like to eat spicy food. Mcdonalds, Pizza Hut, Starbucks, Coffee by D Bella, Ovenstory Pizza Kitchen, Sbarros are just few places I love to eat at.
